arts.ttl: European football: João Félix’s debut goal eases Milan into Coppa Italia semi
arts.sum: Tammy Abraham also nets twice in victory over Roma Real Madrid progress in Copa del Rey after late winner João Félix scored on his debut and Tammy Abraham netted a double against his parent club to earn Milan a 3-1 win over Roma in their Coppa Italia quarter-final at the San Siro on Wednesday. Abraham, who joined Milan from Roma in August on a season-long loan deal, put the hosts in front with a header in the 16th minute before punishing his old teammates again three minutes before the break. arts.ttl: Milan's new signings help the Rossoneri beat Roma 3-1 to reach Italian Cup semifinals
arts.sum: The Rossoneri will face either city rival Inter Milan or Lazio in a two-legged semifinal in April. Milan beat Roma 3-1, with debutants João Félix and Santiago Giménez combining for their new team’s third goal.

arts.ttl: Coppa Italia | Milan 3-1 Roma: Match Report
arts.sum: AC Milan secured a convincing 3-1 victory over AS Roma at the San Siro to progress in the Coppa Italia. The Rossoneri's performance was highlighted by a stellar display from Tammy Abraham, who netted twice against his parent club, and a dream debut goal from João Félix. The post Coppa Italia | Milan 3-1 Roma: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.
